result.html: Bhí an-chraic againnWe had great fun.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an-ċraic againnWe had great fun.

result.eng: I just said that for fun.
result.ga: Ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sin
result.orig: Ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sin
result.html: Ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sinI just said that for fun.
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫe le greann a dúirt mé sinI just said that for fun.

result.eng: I was in the bar with a few friends and it was great fun.
result.ga: Bhí mé sa bheár le cúpla cara agus bhí an chraic go hiontach
result.orig: Bhí mé sa bheár le cúpla cara agus bhí an chraic go hiontach
result.html: Bhí mé sa bheár le cúpla cara agus bhí an chraic go hiontachI was in the bar with a few friends and it was great fun.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé sa ḃeár le cúpla cara agus ḃí an ċraic go hiontaċI was in the bar with a few friends and it was great fun.

result.eng: The Irish are always looking for some fun.
result.ga: Bíonn na hÉireannaigh i gcónaí ar thóir na craice
result.orig: Bíonn na hÉireannaigh i gcónaí ar thóir na craice
result.html: Bíonn na hÉireannaigh i gcónaí ar thóir na craiceThe Irish are always looking for some fun.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn na hÉireannaiġ i gcónaí ar ṫóir na craiceThe Irish are always looking for some fun.

result.html: Is mór an spórt éIt's great fun.
result.ponchtml: Is mór an spórt éIt's great fun.

result.eng: We have a lot of fun.
result.html: Bíonn an-chraic againnWe have a lot of fun.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn an-ċraic againnWe have a lot of fun.

result.eng: They started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ga: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.orig: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.html: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ponchtml: Ṫoisiġ siad a ṁagaḋ ar Ṡeimí a rá leis gurb í a ḃeaḋ mar ṁnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.

result.eng: As soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ga: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.orig: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.html: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ponchtml: Aon uair aṁáin a ġeiḃ duine ciall tá deireaḋ aige le haoiḃneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
